2:
When evildoers approached me to devour my flesh,
\q my adversaries and my enemies stumbled and fell.
\q
3:
Though an army encamps against me,
\q my heart will not fear;
\q though war rises up against me,
\q even then I will remain confident.
4:
One thing have I asked of Yahweh, and I will seek that:
\q that I may live in the house of Yahweh all the days of my life,
\q to see the beauty of Yahweh
\q and to meditate in his temple.
5:
For in the day of trouble he will hide me in his shelter;
\q in the cover of his tent he will conceal me.
\q He will lift me high on a rock!
\q
6:
Then my head will be lifted up above my enemies all around me,
\q and I will offer sacrifices of joy in his tent!
\q I will sing and make songs to Yahweh!
7:
Hear, Yahweh, my voice when I cry out!
\q Have mercy on me, and answer me!
\q
8:
My heart says about you,
\q "Seek his face!" I seek your face, Yahweh!
10:
Even if my father and my mother forsake me,
\q Yahweh will take me in.
11:
Teach me your way, Yahweh!
\q Lead me on a level path
\q because of my enemies.
\q
12:
Do not give me up to the desires of my enemies,
\q for false witnesses have risen up against me,
\q and they breathe out violence!
13:
What would have happened to me if I had not believed that I would see the goodness of Yahweh in the land of the living?
\q
